translations.en: ğŸ˜ï¸ At some point in your journey, you arrive in a charming little village. You reach the center of the village, however it turns out that there are only two shops: a jewelry store and an inn. You learn from a bystander that the jewelry is held by an old man. It is a well known fact that he makes beautiful jewellery such as necklaces and rings. As for the inn run by a couple, it seems pretty successful.

translations.fr: Aller voir le bijoutier et discuter.
translations.en: Go and have a talk with the jeweller.

translations.fr: Vous discutez avec le bijoutier et vous vous liez d'amitiÃ© avec lui. Il vous offre alors un objet en gage de cette nouvelle amitiÃ©.
translations.en: You talk with the jeweller and you bond with him. He then offers you an object as a token of this new friendship.

translations.fr: Vous dÃ©cidez de tenter de marchander afin de vous acheter un des bijoux, pour peu cher. Vous discutez un long moment mais le vieillard est un trÃ¨s bon marchand et il ne cÃ¨de pas. Vous repartez aprÃ¨s avoir compris qu'il ne compte pas baisser ses prix.
translations.en: You decide to try to haggle in order to buy yourself one of the jewels for a smaller price. You talk for a long time but the old man is very tough in business and he does not give in. You leave after finally understanding that he does not intend to lower his prices.

translations.fr: Vous faites confiance Ã  vos capacitÃ©s d'infiltration. Vous y allez, et fort heureusement le vieillard Ã©tait absent. Vous arrivez Ã  voler le contenu de la caisse et dÃ©guerpissez.
translations.en: You trust your infiltration abilities. You go to the jewelry store and, fortunately, the old man is absent. You manage to steal the contents of one of the crates and run away.

translations.fr: Vous arrivez devant la boutique et vous entrez dedans dans le but de voler le bijoutier. Alors que vous vous emparez de l'argent du bijoutier, un garde personnel vous assomme. Vous vous rÃ©veillez quelques heures plus tard, le long d'un sentier.
translations.en: You arrive in front of the shop and you enter in order to rob the jeweller. As you grab the jeweller's money, a personal guard knocks you out. You wake up a few hours later, on the side of a road.
Go to rest at the inn.

translations.fr: Vous arrivez Ã  l'auberge et vous reprenez un peu d'Ã©nergie grÃ¢ce Ã  un bon repas et une sieste bien mÃ©ritÃ©e.
translations.en: You arrive at the inn and regain some strength after a good meal and a well deserved nap.

translations.fr: Vous arrivez Ã  l'auberge qui est malheureusement pleine. Vous y prenez quand mÃªme un repas, et reprenez votre chemin.
translations.en: You arrive at the inn which is fully booked. You still have a take-away meal, and go on your way.

translations.fr: Par malheur l'auberge est fermÃ©e et vous dÃ©cidez de continuer votre chemin affamÃ© et fatiguÃ©.
translations.en: Unfortunately the inn is closed and you decide to hit the road, hungry and tired.

translations.fr: Vous continuez votre route. En sortant du village, vous croisez un prÃªtre qui vous offre un morceau de pain pour votre pÃ©riple.
translations.en: You continue your journey. As you leave the village, you meet a priest whom offers you a piece of bread for your journey.

translations.en: ğŸš¶ You wait a long time in this square and then merchants start to settle down. It's your lucky day! It's a market, and apples are cheap. You buy some and go on your way.
